item.title: 13 students fall ill after breakfast at Gurukul in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[At least 13 children at the Scheduled Tribes Gurukul in Jogulamba Gadwal district fell ill after having breakfast in the hostel mess on Tuesday.
All the affected children were said to be stable and are being monitored.
According to the hostel warden at the Gurukul, the students were served upma with roasted chickpea powder and ragi jawa for breakfast. While some students ate it, soon others complained of worms in the upma, and they were asked to discard the whole meal. They were given bananas ...]]>
item.author: Authors
